name: Morro & Jasp: Unscripted
description:
The world's first two-player hipster clown performance/argument simulator. Starring Morro and Jasp, Canadian Comedy Award and Dora Award winners.

Beloved clown sisters Morro and Jasp are back — and they need your help! Connect with a friend and play as either bossypants Jasp or kooky Morro in this bright comedic take on the choose-your-own-adventure genre.

As the curtain rises, Morro and Jasp’s newest show is about to start they don't have a script. It's up to you to navigate their way through this performance. Will the show be a smash hit or will the reviews tear it apart? Your choices drive the action!

  • A storytelling game for two: Every single line is chosen by a player! (You can also play single-player if you need some “me” time.)

  • A million different mini-stories: Action, comedy, drama, horror, mystery, romance, sci-fi, fantasy, and more!

  • Over 50 different endings: Perform a brilliant opus, fall asleep on-stage, burn down the theatre, cure a disease… who knows what else?!

Press and Praise for Morro and Jasp

“Two of the most original clowns on the Canadian scene” - Toronto Star

“Barely controlled comic mayhem… Some of the best clowns in the country” - NOW Magazine

“Morro and Jasp are the current rock stars of their field” - Torontoist

“The Amy Poehler and Tina Fey of Canadian Clowning” - Globe and Mail

“Hysterical” - CBC

The Morro and Jasp brand is dedicated to helping our fans find fun and delight wherever, whenever. For over 12 years, we have created awarding winning clown craziness through live events, books, documentaries and now games! Visit us online at www.morroandjasp.com.

Multiplayer is fully compatible between platforms. PC, Mac, iOS and Android — they'll all work together!

Technical problems? Email game@morroandjasp.com.
